original_text: and he said to Korah and all his company, “In the morning the Lord will show who is his, and who is holy, and will bring him near to him. The one whom he chooses he will bring near to him.
korean_text: 고라와 그의 모든 무리에게 말하여 이르되 아침에 여호와께서 자기에게 속한 자가 누구인지, 거룩한 자가 누구인지 보이시고 그 사람을 자기에게 가까이 나아오게 하시되 곧 그가 택하신 자를 자기에게 가까이 나아오게 하시리니

sentences.original_text: and he said to Korah and all his company,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 고라와 그의 모든 무리에게 말하되,

sentences.original_text: In the morning the Lord will show who is his,
sentences.korean_translation: 아침에 주께서 자기의 사람이 누구인지 보이시고,

sentences.original_text: and will bring him near to him.
he will bring near to him.
